alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:38AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Woodruff, southeastern Cleburne and central White Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 238 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crosby, or 7 miles north of Searcy, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Searcy... Augusta... Bald Knob... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... Pangburn... Russell... West Point... Crosby... Hurricane Lake WMA... Steprock... Pryor... Bradford... Letona... Albion... Dewey... Gregory... Fitzhugh... Sidon... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for eastern, central and north central Arkansas.
